name: iterm-mcp
description: Integration with iTerm2 terminal emulator for macOS, enabling LLMs to execute and monitor terminal commands.

tools.name: write_to_terminal
tools.description: Writes text to the active iTerm terminal - often used to run a command in the terminal

command.description: The command to run or text to write to the terminal

tools.name: read_terminal_output
tools.description: Reads the output from the active iTerm terminal

linesOfOutput.description: The number of lines of output to read.

tools.name: send_control_character
tools.description: Sends a control character to the active iTerm terminal (e.g., Control-C, or special sequences like ']' for telnet escape)

letter.description: The letter corresponding to the control character (e.g., 'C' for Control-C, ']' for telnet escape)
